alert.note: Alert for Estill; Lee; Owsley; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 18 at 11:11PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong shower will impact portions of northeastern Owsley, southeastern Estill, Lee and southwestern Wolfe Counties through 1145 PM EDT... At 1109 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong shower over Crystal, or 7 miles northwest of Beattyville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong shower will be near... Fixer, Heidelberg, Standing Rock and Caryton around 1115 PM EDT. Beattyville, Mount Olive, Proctor, Zoe, White Ash, Belle Point, Corgleton, Whisman, Zachariah and Leeco around 1120 PM EDT. Fincastle, Airedale, St. Helens, Maloney, Enoch, Lower Buffalo and Booth around 1125 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this shower include Primrose, Monica, Vada, Tallega, Williba, Grass, Stay, Grannie, Canyon Falls, Fillmore, Athol, Widecreek, Lone, Flat, Mary and Lerose. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
